function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Limited access to working from home for some people based on socioeconomic status, leading to challenges in social distancing and infection prevention.","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Population density in cities","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Household size and family structure","category":"Family","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fragility of the real world","category":"Person","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Possible higher covid-19 prevalence in the community than reported through clinical surveillance.","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential underreporting of covid-19 cases due to limited testing of individuals with severe symptoms.","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Publication of controversial health guidelines","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Non-peer-reviewed manuscripts included in the analysis","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Population density contributing to faster spread of the virus","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Underreporting of new cases of covid-19","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of peer review for included studies in the systematic review","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of public health interventions associated with certain humidity and temperature conditions","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Retailers not using digital signs to present covid information","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Retailers not demonstrating corporate social responsibility through signage","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of communication with retailers about posted signs","category":"Communication","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited data collection due to covid-19 restrictions","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Need for rapid communication during crises","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Operational changes for retailers to operate under social distancing","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variation in regulations between geographic locations","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of readily available covid-19 content and necessary software code for digital signs","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Repurposing equipment as a coping mechanism for retailers","category":"business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of alternative contact methods for customers at closed retailers","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate crisis management planning for small retailers","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective use of digital signs by multi-location retailers during pandemic","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Informal signs conveying regret, gratitude, and well-wishes may lead to increased foot traffic and close interactions, posing a risk of contagious disease spread.","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Introduction of non-local retail brands and their signage may not align with the neighborhood’s nature, potentially impacting the sense of community and local identity.","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inconsistent compliance with government regulations due to lack of resources for smaller retailers, potentially leading to increased risk of disease transmission.","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of standardized signage in small businesses may result in inconsistent communication of covid-19 information to the public.","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited ability of small businesses to develop visually appealing and effective signage may hamper the communication of covid-19 precautions and symptoms.","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficulty in accessing digitized information for customers without online access","category":"Organization","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Panic buying leading to stockouts and scarcity of essential goods","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of updating information on signs over time during the pandemic.","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Classification of various establishments as ’retailers’ may overlook specific risks associated with different types of businesses, such as healthcare facilities and personal care services.","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close proximity of residential and commercial areas","category":"Community","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduced visibility of tobacco and vaping products may increase the likelihood of teenagers seeking out these products through other means, contributing to the spread of addiction and related health issues.","category":"Community","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited time and resources for retailers to react to covid-19 guidelines resulted in challenges in implementing proper health and safety measures, potentially leading to the spread of contagious diseases within retail environments.","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Non-compliance with regulations for social distancing and closure of non-essential services","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Layoffs and remote work due to closure of non-essential services","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of public awareness of the term \\'social distancing\\'","category":"Community","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of access to virtual reality technology in low-income countries due to high cost and computing power requirement.","category":"Organization","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shortage of technical virtual reality experts to develop virtual reality applications suitable for medical education and healthcare.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited access to a large covid-19 dataset for training and testing ai models","category":"Organization","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of awareness about the potential of blockchain in health systems","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of autonomous robots in the interconnected iomt infrastructure may lead to bias and breach of privacy in collecting samples from infected patients.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of clear who regulations and policies on the use of autonomous and unmanned iomt concepts in fighting covid-19.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sharing of covid-19 data may breach privacy and security of the individuals","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited access to spatial covid-19 data for spatial mapping and visualization","category":"Organization","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Scalability problems with remote consultations and diagnosis","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Privacy concerns with contact-tracing apps","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Tracking of home-quarantined individuals using gps and mobile phones","category":"Health","confidence":"High"}]}
